## Welcome!

Welcome to the R for Novices lesson series using the Gapminder dataset.

These lessons are designed to help you learn R programming fundamentals through practical data analysis examples.

## Available Lessons

1. [Exploring Data Frames](lessons/exploring_dataframes.html) - Learn to manipulate and explore data frames in R

## About

This is a collection of Software Carpentry-style lessons for learning R programming.

## Getting Started

To follow along with these lessons, you'll need:

- R (version 4.0 or higher)
- RStudio (recommended)
- The gapminder package

Install the gapminder package with:

```r
install.packages("gapminder")
```
